name: Clear Discord (This project is discontinued)
description: This project is discontinued. A nice and clear theme for discord
additional_info:
This project is discontinued.
I recommend using the discord client with Better Discord installed: https://betterdiscord.net/home/
I also have a discord server for support with the theme: https://discord.gg/0yE9HoBlpr8dRdhe
This will be rarely updated since my main focus is the Better Discord version.
